Comment.Review: Amelia and Gerard getting together was not expected by anyone, let alone each of them. Their romance is sweet, fun at times and seems strong enough to stand up to disappointments and disasters.A good read and I was pulled to reading straight through.
Comment.Title: Amelia, An Autumn Bride

Name: Amelia, An Autumn Bride (A Brides For All Seasons Novel)
Author: Hildie McQueen
